content: हिम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [हि-मक्] Cold, frigid, frosty, dewy, --मः {@--1@} The cold season, winter. {@--2@} The moon. {@--3@} The Himālaya mountain. {@--4@} The sandal tree. {@--5@} Camphor. --मं {@--1@} Frost, hoar-frost; <ls>R. 1. 46</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 25</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 1.">11</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 66</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 44</ls>, <ls>Ki. 5. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Cold, coldness. {@--3@} A lotus. {@--4@} Fresh butter. {@--5@} A pearl. {@--6@} Night. {@--7@} Tin. {@--8@} Sandal wood.
